title: Looking to get better at the Game
body:
Hello I am looking for people to play with in league, who can teach me a thing or two in the game (Cos I still not that good at the game) I am open minded too people, and love too play league a lot, I play Bots cos I still not good at the game I would love to play this game in ranked more but people are just too good for me so I don't have that much fun in ranked. Too keep it cool here are some Rules.
>Have too be over 16
>No getting mad easy (still bad at the game)
>And enjoys league of legends
If you pass these 3 things your in.
My name is FiregamesKing I am level 25. No judging.
I love to play{{champion:150}}{{champion:74}}{{champion:17}} {{champion:75}}and more if needed.
And if you good player to me their is a Prize at the end of the training.
$10 dollars of RP to you. NO JOKE. 
If your up to it  don't be afraid to add me I am very nice person and is looking for your help.
Sorry for the bad grammar. 
I am on most days of the week and weekend.
And I am a Australia so time may be a problem. 
Thank you.

replies.body: I will give the RP to the person who help me, this deal will be up till 26 December then I will take this all down.

Yeah, I'll help you but I'm not going to take your money. Add me in game (I'm only in bronze but i still am relatively knowledgable)
IGN: Traloop

Postscript:
http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php If you go to this link there are coaches who are between plat and diamond (which is a really good rank). They will help you with all aspects of the game and some even do it for free. I personally would recommend a guy called 'Adepta Sororitas'. He is really knowledgeable, reliable and friendly. I hope I helped. The offer is still up if you want to add me, but I think these guys would be much more helpful.
kind regards
-Traloop
thank you for being so nice. :)
Maybe you could look into joining a gaming clan, that way you get exposure to a variety of players all with different experience.

i could teach you gnar or nasus, but i don't use teemo or heim at all, so i cant help you there

and just in case you are thinking it. the number in my name has nothing to do with age.
